# Hunter's Mercy, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 4]], [[4th Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 4]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 7]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mage's Tower

*Your eyes glow red, but you see the world as normal except when you look at your target. A small glowing dot reveals the creatureâ€™s weakest point.*

As *[[Hunter's Mercy (Spell)|hunter's mercy]],* except the first shot of each round is automatically a critical hit if it strikes the target.
